templates.content: We partner with various domestic and international manufacturing facilities to create our gummies. Our Ultras (softgels), capsules, and protein powders are manufactured in the US. For our gummy supplement line, all are made in the USA with the exception of the following products which are made in Colombia-as indicated on the product label: Adult Multi + Probiotic, Extra Strength Probiotic, Bedtime Beauty, Kids Multi + Omega 3, and Kid's Prebiotic + Probiotic. All products are packaged and rigorously tested for quality by third-party laboratories in the USA.

templates.content: We don't currently offer any iron-containing gummy products. Iron has a very strong taste which can be difficult to mask in a gummy. Given these challenges, we have formulated our gummies without iron. We do offer Ultra Strength Essential Prenatal Multi soft gels and Ultra Strength Women's Multi soft gels which contain a gentle form of iron.

templates.content: Ashwagandha has been clinically studied where results have demonstrated improved sexual function in healthy women. Key markers of this research include satisfaction, lubrication, arousal, and orgasm. Damiana and Maca have been used for centuries to support desire. Ashwagandha has been clinically studied to provide benefits relating to libido in as little as 8 weeks of daily supplementation.
templates.name: How long does it takes for Lovin' Libido to show effect?

templates.content: Lovin' Libido contains traditionally used herbal ingredients to enhance vitality. It is safe for any gender to take, however, it's formulated with Ashwagandha which has been clinically studied with women. Current research doesn't show that this ingredient shows the same results for men.
templates.name: Is Lovin' Libido only for women?

templates.content: Our products are dietary supplements and, as such, aren't intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. We're also unable to provide information about individual health conditions. The Metabolism Gummy Rings are made with Apple Cider Vinegar, B12, and Chromium to support lean body mass and help boost metabolism. Prior to starting the use of any supplement, we'd recommend speaking with a healthcare provider that can confirm if there are any potential concerns with medications you may be taking or prior/present medical conditions. Additionally, our gummies aren't formulated with the top 8 allergens (soy, eggs, peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish, wheat, milk). Our manufacturing facility may produce other products that contain those allergens on the same lines as our products, however, our suppliers comply with Good Manufacturing Practices and use appropriate cleaning methods to prevent cross-contamination. The lines are also tested for cross-contamination prior to producing our products.
templates.name: Can I use this for x disease?

templates.content: We believe the health benefits that go along with enriching the diet in essential nutrients far outweigh the slight disadvantage of delivering them with sugar. Importantly, the amount of sugar in a serving of OLLY gummies (2 to 4 grams) represents a fraction of the average total daily sugar intake by most Americans (80 grams). It's roughly equivalent to eating about 5-10 raisins or drinking an eighth of a cup of apple juice. The real advantage of gummies is that people actually enjoy taking them - so they do. If supplements don't get eaten because the experience is unpleasant, then they're not very effective supplements. We chose not to use artificial "sugar-free" sweeteners because they have been linked to health issues and we wanted to stick with only natural sweeteners, colors and flavors.
templates.name: Is the sugar in OLLY gummies counterproductive to health?

templates.content: While we do support the non-GMO movement, our line is presently not non-GMO verified. Sourcing exclusively non-GMO ingredients is challenging in the world of dietary supplements as there is a lengthy process and validation required. However, we are exploring having a non-GMO offering in the future that will give users who value non-GMO products a choice within the OLLY lineup.

templates.content: Both softgels and capsules are easy to swallow pills. Softgels are filled with a liquid blend of vitamins and minerals while capsules are filled with a powder blend. The outer shell of softgels is made of gelatin and have a delightful faint smell of either peppermint or strawberry. The outer shell of the capsules are made of hypromellose, a vegetarian alternative to gelatin. The capsules have no smell.
templates.name: What is the difference between softgels and capsules?

templates.content: Please contact your child's physician to discuss your concern. While most vitamins are easily eliminated from the body without causing any side effects, high doses of fat-soluble nutrients such as vitamins D and A are stored by the body. Also, none of our products contain added iron, the primary concern in cases of multivitamin overdose.
templates.name: What if my child eats more than the recommended serving size of gummies?

templates.content: Yes, however, dietary supplements should always be placed out of reach of children. In case our gummy bottles do find their way into the hands of your little one, our push-and-turn cap is designed to foil their attempts to open it.
templates.name: Are the lids of the gummy bottles child resistant?

templates.content: Our products expire 18 months from the date at which they were manufactured. Vitamins and minerals naturally break down over time. Therefore, while the products are still active and safe to take, we do not guarantee their potency.
templates.name: What is the shelf life/when do they expire?

templates.content:
On April 22, 2024, a new law took effect in New York state that restricts the sale of certain types of dietary supplements marketed for muscle building and weight loss. In order to purchase these types of products, customers will need to verify that they are over the age of 18 at the time of purchase and at the time of delivery.

OLLY has three products impacted by this new law: Combat Cravings, Metabolism Gummy Rings, and Post-Game Recovery Gummy Rings. We made our best efforts to continue shipping these products to New York; however, there are no delivery services that can meet the law's requirements. Unfortunately, these products are not available for shipment to New York. You can purchase them locally in New York with proof of age or through Amazon. We apologize for any inconvenience this causes.
templates.name: Can I order from NY/ New York, is there an age restriction?
